title: Advanced Instructional Design for Strengthening Physics Epistemology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Targeting graduate-level science majors and researchers, this program provides a real-time interactive and discussion-based learning environment utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to critically analyze core physics concepts from an epistemological perspective
Improve conceptual flexibility in physics problem-solving by over 30% through explicit/implicit epistemological teaching methods

Learners identify discrepancies between scientific experimental data (e.g., spectroscopy results) and theoretical models (e.g., quantum mechanics-based simulations) in three cases, apply at least two epistemological evaluation criteria (validity, consistency, explanatory power) per case, and write a 500-character evaluation report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
